titleStmt.title: Woodford Ashley et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG7359

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Cromwell Ohio Co Ky
November the 7th 1865

Mr Thos Mr Thomas E Bramlet Dear Sir We The under sined Do Certify that We Know Isaac Embry to bee a Standit and upright honest Man and Was ask By a friend to step in his Grocery to Sell afew Minutes for Whitch he Was fined $20 for Selling Whiskey in the of Ohio Circuit Cort We Know him to be Inosent We Pray the to Remit the Find

Woodford
Woodford Ashley
valentin t Ashley
Carry ashley
Cenard J gerry
James R alford
William embrey
Embrey
Thomas Embrey
J. L Whitley
Kilen renfro
Wm maden
Antney maden
Wm Embrey
Bennet
Wesley Embry
hamilton watson
Robert Embry
George Embry
Wm Embrey
hartford Gapp
Alen
Seth vilet
Green Embry

Ohio Cir Ct
vs
Isaac Embry
$20,
Tipling
Remitted 13th Nov/65
